items.title: Tip of the Day: Summon Strategy
items.description: Always save your gems for limited-time banners to maximize your chances of getting rare heroes! 💎

items.title: Hero Synergy: Team Composition
items.description: Pair heroes with complementary skills for better synergy in battles. For example, combine a healer with a damage dealer! ⚔️❤️

items.title: Resource Management: Gems and Gold
items.description: Prioritize spending gems on banners and gold on upgrading your heroes to keep your team strong! 💰

items.title: Event Participation: Limited-Time Events
items.description: Join events for exclusive rewards and unique heroes. Don’t miss out on these opportunities! 🎉

items.title: Daily Quests: Free Rewards
items.description: Complete daily quests for free gems and resources. Log in every day to maximize your rewards! 📅

items.title: Stars and Ascension: Hero Upgrades
items.description: Upgrade your heroes by collecting stars and ascending them to unlock their full potential! 🌟

items.title: Monthly Login Bonus: Free Gems
items.description: Don’t forget to log in daily for your monthly bonus! Collect free gems and resources just for playing! 🎁

items.title: When the Stars Align: Hero Power Boost
items.description: 22nd every month, all heroes stats will be buffed by 10 times! Use this opportunity to challenge harder content! 🌌

items.title: Community Tip: Team Up!
items.description: Join the community to share tips and strategies with other players. Teamwork makes the dream work! 🤝

items.title: Revival System: Bring Back Your Heroes
items.description: Lost a battle? Use the revival system to bring them back to life with a small cost. Don’t let your chances fade away! 💀

items.title: Hero Customization: Skins and Outfits
items.description: Unlock unique skins and outfits for your heroes to personalize your team. Look good while you fight! 🎨

items.title: Guilds: Join Forces
items.description: Create or join a guild to participate in guild wars and earn exclusive rewards. Strength in numbers! 🏰
